speaker: agent
text: Hi ma' am, my name is [PERSON_NAME].

speaker: agent
text: Like this call is just to inform me that like today your Medicare is getting upgraded.

speaker: agent
text: So that's why you are getting some extra benefits from your medicare at zero additional cost to you.

speaker: customer
text: Hope that sounds good to you.

speaker: agent
text: So sir, like the benefits you will be receiving after this, you don't have to pay anything for your medications or prescriptions.

speaker: agent
text: You don't have to pay no co pays when you visit to your [OCCUPATION] or the specialist.

speaker: customer
text: And you will receive some wide range of coverages like dental, vision, hearing, transportation services.

speaker: agent
text: And also sir, you will receive like $[MONEY_AMOUNT] money back to your [ORGANIZATION] Security check every month at zero additional cost to you.

speaker: agent
text: So sir, like to get these benefits I will just ask you two to three qualifying questions like is your Medicare part A and part B is active right now.

speaker: agent
text: And sir, for the confirmation, you live in [LOCATION], [LOCATION].

speaker: agent
text: Your zip code is [LOCATION], is that correct?

speaker: customer
text: Well actually no, if the town is [LOCATION].

speaker: customer
text: [LOCATION] and [LOCATION] are separated by a river.

speaker: customer
text: And the address which with me it's like [LOCATION] [LOCATION] [LOCATION], correct?

speaker: agent
text: Okay, and like in this, like confirm it, do you make your own decisions about your Medicare?

speaker: agent
text: And sir, for the confirmation I have your full name with me is like [PERSON_NAME] [PERSON_NAME].

speaker: agent
text: Okay, so, so like you are qualified to get this extra benefit, sir.

speaker: agent
text: So right now what I will do, I will just like connect your call, sir, to the [OCCUPATION] [OCCUPATION].

speaker: agent
text: He will just need to verify some of the details.

speaker: agent
text: And after that he will just connect your call to the [OCCUPATION] [OCCUPATION] [OCCUPATION] who is from your same area, sir, from the same zip code.

speaker: customer
text: He will just going to like explain you in what are the benefits you are receiving.

speaker: agent
text: And he will just going to let you know when you will be receiving the paperwork about these benefits so you can read about the benefits as well.

speaker: customer
text: Okay, why don't we just skip that and call it a day because sir, they will just going to let you know like how to use these benefits.

speaker: agent
text: Why are you getting this benefit?

speaker: customer
text: And after they will just going to let you know like when you will be receiving the paperwork.

speaker: agent
text: Like they will not going to take much of your time, sir.

speaker: agent
text: Okay, so sir, before connecting your call, can you please confirm.

speaker: agent
text: I appreciate your time and patience.

speaker: agent
text: Hey, thank you so much for holding on the line.

speaker: agent
text: Whom do I have pleasure speaking with?

speaker: agent
text: I have Mr. [PERSON_NAME] [PERSON_NAME] on the line with me.

speaker: agent
text: You may take over the call.

speaker: agent
text: I'll be more than happy to help.
